channel.title: Please help!
channel.description: Every time I download a source and client there's always something wrong e.g. "error connecting to server" when I try to log into it.. There's only been one that works for me but it sucks. Is there a way I can change to a trisidia source or something with the same client? I need a short tut on how to.

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @elimination elimination
item.description:
@elimination wrote:

start >command prompt > write CMD > Ipconfig
write your IPv4-adress in a notebook.

Go to your server client > java folder > Client.java
CTRL+F Search for 127.0.0.0
replace that with your IPv4-adress
save / Compile.

edit: incase you cant find 127.0.0.0 search for Server
Youll see a Ip adress replace that with yours

Read full topic
